body: This looks nice. I could imagine all of this information being on a single line, but the current format is easy to read. Maybe whichever automated tool we'd like to read this can inspire a more compact format; errcheck shouldn't have problems at least. Is 5 because we lose track of the relevant top-level variable since every object outside of the function is aliased with theSink? Otherwise, this is good and it'll help to have a reference format as I continue to add this to gccgo.
